setup.title: Initial Setup
setup.description: Create your admin account to get started
setup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
setup.passwordNeedsUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
setup.passwordNeedsLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
setup.passwordNeedsNumber: Must contain at least one number
setup.passwordNeedsSpecial: Must contain at least one special character
setup.passwordRequirements: Minimum 8 characters, with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character

settings.title: Settings
settings.runningLatest: You are running the latest version of DockPilot
settings.upgradeInProgressDescription: Upgrading to version {{version}}. This may take a few minutes...
settings.upgradeStepPulling: Downloading new version and updating containers...
settings.upgradeWarning: Do not close this page or restart the server during the upgrade. The system will restart automatically when finished.
settings.upgradeComplete: Upgrade completed successfully! The page will refresh shortly.
settings.upgradeConfirm: Are you sure you want to upgrade to version {{version}}? The system will restart during the upgrade.
settings.upgradeAlreadyInProgress: An upgrade is already in progress. Please wait.
settings.upgradeFailed: Failed to start upgrade. Please try again.
settings.updateCheckFailed: Failed to check for updates. Please try again.
settings.autoUpdateDescription: When enabled, DockPilot will automatically check for and install updates daily at 00:00 UTC.
settings.autoUpdateActive: Automatic updates are enabled. DockPilot will check for new versions every day at 00:00 UTC and install them automatically.
settings.autoUpdateDisabled: Automatic updates are disabled. You can manually check for updates and upgrade from this page.

errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
